title: MVP-1: learned ball model integration (checkpoint-driven)

runbooks.notes: No runbook changes required for this intent.

summary: Replace/augment the baseline ball detector with a learned checkpoint-driven detector once it is available.
Preserve trust-first semantics: explicit missing/unknown; no hallucination; quality metrics drive downstream gating.
non_goals: Guaranteeing ball present on every frame.
success_criteria: A bundle run can use a learned ball checkpoint to emit non-empty present ball records on a deterministic UAT clip.
Ball missing/unknown semantics remain explicit and contract-valid.
Ball quality metrics are exposed for event/highlight gating.

work_packages.title: Detector + tracker
items: TASK-BALL-DET-LEARNED-MVP-001 Integrate a learned ball detector backend with checkpoint selection.
TASK-BALL-TRACK-MVP-001 Track the ball conservatively with explicit missing/unknown per frame.

work_packages.title: Contract integration
items: TASK-BALL-CONTRACT-INTEGRATION-MVP-001 Ensure learned ball outputs conform to the contract and validators.
